name: Faisal Siddiqi
story: Azim was born in a small village in Iran. He grew up surrounded by poverty and violence. His family was not religious, but Azim found comfort in Islam. He joined the Iranian army at a young age and quickly rose through the ranks. However, he became disillusioned with the corruption and incompetence he saw around him. When he had the opportunity to join a private military contractor, he took it. He has been working for them ever since, honing his skills as an autorifleman and trying to make a better life for himself.
